snippet.title: Sonic Boom: Fire & Ice - Nintendo 3DS Trailer
snippet.description:
Race through this epic new adventure as Sonic, Tails, Amy, Knuckles or Sticks to stop Dr. Eggman, and an all new adversary D-Fekt. Harness the power of fire and ice to blaze through obstacles, puzzles, and freeze enemies in their tracks!

Sonic Boom: Fire & Ice is available September 27th: https://goo.gl/6Vhyrn

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com
